title: cannot buy champions in champion collection
body: cannot buy champions in champion collection, have to buy it through store

replies.body: True, it's very not comfortable that you check a champ in the [collection] and want to buy it immediately, but you have to go to the [store] and search for it again. But if we can buy champs in the [collection], do we still need a store? Is there any possibility that [collection] and [store] can be merged together?
